name: SWEET PROTECTION Trooper II MIPS Helmet - Unisex
description: Like a helmet from the future. Designed for freeriders, it's easy to adjust and comfort-focused. Carbon-fibre shell inserts amp up protection when you're heading for the backbowl. Plus, MIPS technology helps protect your brain from rotational forces or sudden impacts. With great venting and audio compatibility, it's easy to ride in all day.Thermoplastic and carbon-laminated shell provides incredible strength and durability.Multi-directional Impact Protection System protects your brain from rotational forces.Integrated impact shields offer increased protection at vulnerable areas.EPS inner absorbs and dissipates shock in the event of an impact.Vented shell and liner keeps airflow moving through.Dial fit allows easy and quick adjustment for all-day comfort.Quick dry liner can be removed for easy washing.Magnetic chin buckle releases to the side.Audio compatible.
